code: import Emoji from"./Emoji.js";import'./greetings.css';var DateTime=function DateTime(){var greet;var userName='Joshua';var userLastName='Cordoba';var myDate=new Date();var hrs=myDate.getHours();if(hrs<12){greet='Good morning ☕️';}else if(hrs>=12&&hrs<=17){greet='Good afternoon ☀︎ ';}else if(hrs>=17&&hrs<=24){greet='Good evening 🌙';}return"".concat(greet," ").concat(userName,".");};DateTime();export default DateTime;
